verses.text: \w On|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* first \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w after|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Israelites \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*:

“\w Take|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w census|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, listing \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w number|strong="H6485"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w age|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w older|strong="H4605"\w* \w by|strong="H8141"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* divisions—\w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w can|strong="H1121"\w* serve \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*’s \w army|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w man|strong="H7218"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* each \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* each \w family|strong="H1004"\w*, must \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H1004"\w*.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* assist you: \w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* tribe \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, Elizur \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shedeur|strong="H7707"\w*;
\w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, \w Shelumiel|strong="H8017"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zurishaddai|strong="H6701"\w*;
\w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Nahshon|strong="H5177"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Amminadab|strong="H5992"\w*;

\w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, Eliab \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Helon|strong="H2497"\w*;

\w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*: \w from|strong="H1121"\w* Ephraim, Elishama \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammihud|strong="H5989"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w Gamaliel|strong="H1583"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Pedahzur|strong="H6301"\w*;
\w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, Abidan \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gideoni|strong="H1441"\w*;
\w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, Ahiezer \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammishaddai|strong="H5996"\w*;

\w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, Eliasaph \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Deuel|strong="H1845"\w*;
\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, Ahira \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Enan|strong="H5881"\w*.”

\w These|strong="H1992"\w* \w men|strong="H7218"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* appointed \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3478"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*; \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3478"\w* \w leaders|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H3478"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* fathers, \w the|strong="H3478"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H3478"\w* clans \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w these|strong="H3947"\w* \w men|strong="H8034"\w* who \w had|strong="H4872"\w* been \w designated|strong="H5344"\w* \w by|strong="H5344"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*,
